Package jMidiSequencerBeta.view

Class CompositeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • jMidiSequencerBeta.view.AudioView
        • jMidiSequencerBeta.view.CompositeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, ICompositionView
    public class CompositeView
extends AudioView
    The class Creates an Audio Visual view of the composition.
